name: novel-mycoviruses-discovered-in-the-mycovirome-of-a-necrotrophic-fungus_2021
bibtex: @article{Ruiz_Padilla_2021, title={Novel Mycoviruses Discovered in the Mycovirome of a Necrotrophic Fungus}, volume={12}, ISSN={2150-7511}, url={http://dx.doi.org/10.1128/mbio.03705-20}, DOI={10.1128/mbio.03705-20}, number={3}, journal={mBio}, publisher={American Society for Microbiology}, author={Ruiz-Padilla, Ana and Rodríguez-Romero, Julio and Gómez-Cid, Irene and Pacifico, Davide and Ayllón, María A.}, editor={Wickner, Reed B.}, year={2021}, month=jun }
description: The results obtained here have expanded our knowledge of mycoviral diversity, horizontal transfers, and putative cross-kingdom events. To date, this study presents the most extensive and wide diversity collection of mycoviruses infecting the necrotrophic fungusB. cinerea
title: Novel Mycoviruses Discovered in the Mycovirome of a Necrotrophic Fungus
